hero.title: Building the Future of
hero.description: At Devlizer, we're not just building websites and mobile apps—we're building the future of digital experiences. Whether you're a startup with a bold idea or an established business aiming to level up, we help you bring your vision to life.

founded.title: Founded with Passion
founded.description: Founded with a passion for innovation and a deep understanding of business technology, Devlizer combines modern development approaches with a strong focus on usability, performance, and business impact.
founded.specialization: We specialize in creating powerful websites and mobile apps, and we're also the home of a growing suite of helpful business software products designed to solve real-world problems.

hero.title: Our Latest
hero.description: Discover our portfolio of innovative projects that showcase modern technology and expert craftsmanship.

widgetEase.title: Widget Ease
widgetEase.subtitle: Business Software
widgetEase.description: Widget Ease is a business software solution designed to transform how businesses handle customer support. At its core, it's a smart, embeddable chat widget powered by AI, trained to provide human-like, context-aware responses 24/7.
widgetEase.longDescription: The platform features a simple onboarding process for clients, allowing them to generate and install their widget in minutes. It also includes an intuitive admin dashboard where businesses can customize the assistant's tone, upload documentation, monitor conversations, and analyze performance metrics.

joblizer.title: Joblizer
joblizer.subtitle: Job Matching Platform
joblizer.description: Skip the resume blackhole and get hired smarter. Joblizer revolutionizes how job seekers and recruiters connect by moving beyond outdated ATS systems and keyword matching.
joblizer.longDescription: An AI-powered job matching platform that intelligently connects job seekers with recruiters. Create your profile once, and let AI match you with suitable jobs. Features one-click applications, intelligent scoring, and detailed AI reports for both job seekers and employers. No more applying 100 times with the same details or filtered out by traditional ATS systems.

menulizer.title: Menulizer
menulizer.subtitle: Restaurant Technology
menulizer.description: Create digital menus in minutes. Transform your restaurant with contactless QR code menus and seamless ordering that customers can access directly from their phones.
menulizer.longDescription: A comprehensive restaurant management solution that enables contactless dining experiences. Features instant QR code generation, direct ordering from phones, multi-language support, and real-time order management. Customers can browse beautiful mobile menus and place orders hassle-free, while restaurants manage everything from an intuitive dashboard.

comingSoon.longDescription: More amazing projects are being crafted using the latest technologies. Each project demonstrates expertise in creating powerful business solutions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Get quick answers to common questions

timeline.question: What's your typical project timeline?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 2-6 months. I'll provide a detailed timeline after discussing your requirements.

international.question: Do you work with international clients?
international.answer: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am experienced in remote collaboration. I'm flexible with time zones and communication preferences.

solutions.question: What kind of solutions do you create?
solutions.answer: I create modern websites, mobile apps, and business software using the latest technologies. I focus on solutions that are reliable, user-friendly, and help your business grow.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
support.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance and support packages to keep your application running smoothly. This includes updates, bug fixes, and feature enhancements.
